website_summaries.verdict: For those seeking kosher hemp seed oils, Foods Alive was the only one we found with this option.
pros: This oil has all the benefits of being raw, organic, non-GMO, and vegan, while also not tasting bad
Most report a light, nutty flavor, which makes the oil go down better
cons: Some find the oil too sticky, while others develop a tolerance for it over time, making it less effective

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Professional Packaging.  Awesome service
customer_reviews.text: Great healthy product. I Mix one bottle of this product with one bottle of Dr. Adorable And a bottle of CBD oil 5000 milligrams from healthyhemp.com. I take one tablespoon in the morning and 1 tablespoon at night extremely helpful for mind body skin hair and organs with many other benefits. Package arrived sealed and intact, Lids on tight no leakage.
customer_reviews.author: obiestar

customer_reviews.title: Hemp oil
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Love it. One caution: if someone using this is on blood thinners, it might effect their platelet count.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great !!
customer_reviews.text: It actually tastes a lot better than other brands !! It is a good product that has many health benefits !!
customer_reviews.author: Flora E Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was my first hemp seed oil purchase. I am very pleased. I have been using this in recipes and also my daughters super thick easily tangled hair. It absorbs quickly and fixes the tangle issue.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I made the smoothie and it tasted great. I thought the hemp oil would give it ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in the B12 Smoothie recipe that I got from the Juicing Bible--pineapple, flax seed, wheat germ, etc. Before the product arrived, I made the smoothie and it tasted great. I thought the hemp oil would give it a bitter taste, but it didn't. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lady S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and freshness
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and freshness. Packaging shows extraction and packaging dates which gives me consumer confidence
customer_reviews.author: nicole clarke

customer_reviews.title: good for arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking hemp oil for my arthritis and it seems to help a lot
customer_reviews.author: Country

customer_reviews.title: Light but tasty and perfect with chopped nuts on most dishes
customer_reviews.text: Always goes faster than I expect! Light but tasty and perfect with chopped nuts on most dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppermomma

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great. And yes it actually relieves pain. I used obmy sore muscles after a work out and got relief from the inflammation and soreness like immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Aspiring Veganista

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I enjoy the earthy smell (I use it as a facial cleanser)
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: It helped me
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this about one week. .. that is all. . One week into this, and I have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that this product is already expired! Buyer beware 😟
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Supposed to taste nutty but nowhere near it. The taste is actually yucky but it's so good for you! Cold pressed organic Hemp Oil has so many benefits that the taste is minute. I will continue to purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: debria seabrook

customer_reviews.title: Hemp Oil
customer_reviews.text: I am using it on just about everything you can. The taste is light with a hint of nuttiness, Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I love heep oil
customer_reviews.text: The hemp seed oil arrived fresh and fast. I love using this in my green smoothies and salads. I got a great bargain on a two pack.
customer_reviews.author: S_MNYC

customer_reviews.title: I am so in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this product. I use it for hair, nails and my skin. My skin is soft and tight.
customer_reviews.author: S.Rabon

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. The product is expired back to 2019. They should be ashamed of themselves
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Principe

customer_reviews.title: and I as such take its color—which I have not seen in any other hemp oil product—to be indicative of its superior quality. While
customer_reviews.text: This product's greenish goodness puts every other brand of hemp oil I ever tried to shame, and I as such take its color—which I have not seen in any other hemp oil product—to be indicative of its superior quality. While I had up to this point consumed other hemp oils owing to my understanding of the excellent mix of essential fatty acids they contain, this brand adds the bonus of *excellent* flavor. The artisan processing, which the Foods Alive states involves temperatures no greater than 108° F, clearly makes a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watson

customer_reviews.title: Hemp oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hemp oil because my doctor said he uses it to stop back pain quickly. It only lasts about 15 minutes, but it's worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Taste is good and I like the non drip top.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina T

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and Price
customer_reviews.text: This was the first hemp oil I purchased and I have used it on food as well as a moisturizer. Smells and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonated

customer_reviews.title: Hemp oil
customer_reviews.text: I found the hemp oil to have an interesting flavor. I am happy with the product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Slimster

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product, but unfortunately I developed some sort of intolerance to it! but the taste is good and has a lot of properties!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a carrier oil for essential oils. I felt it was way too thick and sticky for that. I am sure it would work for other things, just not what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the shopper
customer_reviews.text: great taste,not too strong. really healthy for you. i wish it came in a bigger bottle.other brands have been too strong of a unwanted flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H. Nicholes

customer_reviews.title: I agree that this is a great oil. I have a problem w/my clothes and ...
customer_reviews.text: I agree that this is a great oil. I have a problem w/my clothes and sheets. They feel like they have been starched and I find it very hard to get off. I even have it on my car door. Any one know how to get it off? I never notice it w/other brands.
customer_reviews.author: F J Kenna

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: taste is great awesome for salad dressings and all around good flavor in dishes. seems to be a great replacement for everything but cooking.
customer_reviews.author: r v

customer_reviews.title: so I'm really not sure how good it is
customer_reviews.text: another product that I think I sent to my mom, so I'm really not sure how good it is
customer_reviews.author: Tungu

customer_reviews.title: Why?
customer_reviews.text: Why are all hemp oils (that aren't hundreds of dollars) just hempseed oil? Why not make oil out of the actual plant and not the seed? Why are people so obsessed with freakin seeds?
customer_reviews.author: Trey

product_meta.title: Foods Alive Hemp Seed Oil, Artisan Cold-Pressed, Organic, 8oz (Pack of 2)
feature_bullets: Real health food! Full of the good fats: Omegas 3, 6 and 9.
Our Artisan Cold-Pressed Oils consistently beat the leading brands in blind taste tests
Pressed from seeds grown in mineral rich soil which is why we have an unsurpassed rich, robust flavor
Organic, Non-GMO, Raw, Vegan, Gluten Free and Kosher

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
